text.__SUMMARY__: Tillandsia bryoides is a plant species in the genus Tillandsia. This species is native to Bolivia and Peru.
text.Description:
An extremely small species, with thin stems (3-5 mm diameter), covered in densely packed, imbricate, strict (held against the stem), succulent leaves. It has a single, non-stemmed, self-fertilising flower, with yellow petals. 
It grows in strong or dappled light, with regular moisture.
